items.heading: MFA in Studio Art
items.description: Specialized in contemporary painting techniques with a minor in digital arts. Thesis project explored the intersection of traditional and digital mediums.

items.heading: BFA in Fine Arts
items.description: Focused on painting, drawing, and mixed media. Graduated with honors.

items.heading: Solo Exhibition: "Inner Landscapes"
items.description: A collection of large-scale abstract paintings exploring themes of memory and place.

items.heading: Group Exhibition: "New Perspectives"
items.description: Featured three pieces in a collective exhibition of emerging Pacific Northwest artists.

items.heading: Graduate Showcase
items.description: Thesis exhibition featuring a multimedia installation combining painting, projection, and sound.

items.heading: Emerging Artist Grant
items.description: Awarded funding to develop a new body of work exploring environmental themes.

items.heading: Best in Show
items.description: Awarded for mixed media piece "Fragmented Memory #3".
